```{python}
from sympy import *
```

```{python}
a,b,h = symbols('a b h')
d = Matrix([[0 , a, b], [a, a, h], [b,h,a]])
d.det()
```

```{python}
v = Matrix([[x], [y]])
n = Matrix([[m], [-1]])
proj = v*n.T/(n*n.T)*n.T
proj
```

```{python}
G = Matrix([[1,1,0,1],[2,2,0,2],[1,1,0,1],[1,1,0,1]])
G.rank()
```

```{python}
F = Matrix([[1,2,1],[1,0,1],[1,1,1]])
F.inv()
```

```{python}

()
```

```{python}
a_1, a_2, a_3, b_1, b_2, b_3, c_1, c_2, c_3 = symbols('a_1 a_2 a_3 b_1 b_2 b_3 c_1 c_2 c_3')
```
